component.name: listFilters
component.description: Retrieve a list of filters from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: getFilter
component.description: Retrieve a filters from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: createFilter
component.description: Create a new filter in GoogleAnalytics account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: deleteFilter
component.description: Delete the filter identified by the provided filter ID from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: patchFilter
component.description: Updates an existing filter. This method supports patch semantics.

component.name: updateFilter
component.description: Update details of the filter identified by the provided filter ID.
